title: Crime Alert 10.12.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.12.18
description:
Man who sold stolen bank information to Russians, now cooperating with Robert Mueller's investigation. Woman stabs her friend with a knife at a haunted house. She thought it was a prop. Anthony Weiner to be released from prison early.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
